name: Mother's Den
description:
This project was made by a team of 5 for the Global Game Jam 2021. The theme of the Game Jam was 'Lost and Found'.

It's a third person adventure game, where you play as a loving Mama Mouse who has lost her cuddly baby mice in the wilderness. 

Use WASD to move around, Mouse for camera and listen carefully to your babies to find them in the map. Stereo sound setup recommended.

Credits:

Rugved Khandekar (Game Design)
Rebecca El Cheikh (3D Art, Lighting and Level Design)
Max Sprenger (Programming)
Jan David Wasem (Programming)
Aleksandra Toropova (UI and Animation)
